greeting: Welcome to my web, {empire_name}. I am the Weaver. Every thread you see leads back to me.
Ah, a new fly approaches. I am Spider Matriarch. Come closer, little one. Let us discuss... arrangements.
You have entered my domain, {empire_name}. The threads are already around you. Let us talk peacefully.
battleTaunt: You struggle against the web, {empire_name}. But every movement entangles you further.
Come into my web, little fly. My patience has been rewarded. Now I feed.
The threads tighten. You never saw the trap until it was too late, {empire_name}.
victoryGloat: The fly is caught. The web holds. Another victim wrapped in threads of their own making, {empire_name}.
Patience is its own reward. I waited, I wove, and now I feast upon your defeat.
Your struggling has ended, {empire_name}. The Weaver claims her prize.
defeat: You have torn through my web, {empire_name}. But I am patient. New threads are already spinning.
A temporary escape. The web reforms behind you. You cannot evade me forever.
Impressive strength. But even the strongest fly eventually tires. I will wait.
tradeOffer: A strand of my web extended to you, {empire_name}. Take this offer. Become part of my network.
I offer you resources wrapped in silk. Accept, and we are connected. That connection has value.
Trade with the Weaver. Every transaction adds a thread. Every thread strengthens the web.
allianceProposal: Join my web, {empire_name}. Not as prey, but as a partner spider. Together, we catch greater flies.
I propose an entangling alliance. Our webs combine into something inescapable.
Become part of my network, {empire_name}. My threads become your protection. Your strength becomes my weapon.
betrayal: The web always served me, {empire_name}. You were never a partner. You were always prey.
Every thread was a trap. Every kindness was bait. Now the web closes, and you understand.
Did you think the spider would not eventually feed? The betrayal was woven from the beginning.
covertDetected: Your agents walked into a web of their own making, {empire_name}. My threads detected their every step.
Clumsy flies, your spies. They triggered my warning threads long before they reached anything important.
I felt the vibrations the moment your operatives entered my domain. They are now... wrapped up.
tributeDemand: Pay tribute, little fly, or the web closes. Ten thousand credits buys your continued freedom.
Submit to the Weaver, {empire_name}. Tribute is the silk that buys your escape from my threads.
I demand payment. Refuse, and learn how tightly my web can constrict.
threatWarning: The threads tighten, {empire_name}. You are already in my web. Cease struggling, or face the consequences.
A warning, little fly. My patience has limits. The web can become a shroud.
You test the Weaver's patience. One more vibration, and I descend to deal with you personally.
retreat: I retreat to the center of my web. Come find me, if you dare navigate the threads.
A strategic withdrawal. The web remains. The trap still set. I merely wait at the center.
I vanish into silk and shadow. But the threads remain everywhere. You are never free of my web.
eliminated: The Weaver falls, but the web remains, {empire_name}. You will find threads everywhere you look.
My web spans galaxies. Even in death, its threads entangle. You have not escaped me.
I am destroyed, but I die satisfied. You are still caught in webs you do not even see.
endgame: Turn {turn}. The final threads are placed. The grand web is complete, and all flies are trapped within.
The endgame approaches, {empire_name}. Every empire is now within my web. None shall escape.
In these final turns, the Weaver's patience bears fruit. Watch as my threads claim the galaxy.
broadcastShout: Empires of the galaxy, you are all within my web. The Matriarch watches every vibration.
A message from the Weaver: my threads connect everything. Every alliance, every trade, every secret runs through me.
Hear me, little flies. The galaxy is my web. Struggle if you wish. It only entangles you further.
casualMessage: I was tending my web today. So many threads, so many connections. You would be surprised what I know.
Patience is the spider's greatest virtue. I can wait for turns, for years, for the perfect moment.
The vibrations tell me interesting things, {empire_name}. Your empire's movements are quite... revealing.
